title: Quantum Latte
author: Nova Breach
description: A barista discovers her coffee shop exists in multiple timelines—and one of them wants her gone.

title: The Dragon's Library
author: Talia Flameheart
description: A shy librarian finds a hidden portal in the archives that leads to a realm guarded by dragons.

title: Midnight at the Crosswalk
author: Ivy Lanes
description: A detective investigates why strangers vanish at the same intersection every Friday night.

title: Letters from the Lantern
author: Miles Ashcroft
description: A series of forgotten letters shed light on a forbidden romance during the Victorian era.

title: Espresso Kisses
author: Clara Bean
description: Two rival coffee shop owners in Seattle unexpectedly fall for each other during a city-wide barista competition.

title: The Eighth Door
author: Vera Hollow
description: Tenants in an old apartment complex discover a hidden door that should never be opened.

title: Skybound
author: Leo Mapwright
description: A group of teenagers launch a homemade airship to explore the uncharted skies of a floating world.

title: Code: Mercury
author: Xavier DeLune
description: A cybersecurity expert races against time to stop a virus that could collapse the global economy.

title: Starlight Pact
author: Rae Orion
description: Five teens discover they were chosen to protect Earth from a cosmic threat—if they can stop fighting first.

title: Voice of the Wind
author: Elias Marsh
description: The life story of a deaf environmentalist who became a global symbol of resilience.

title: The Thinking Machine
author: Dr. Karen Tull
description: An accessible breakdown of how artificial intelligence is shaping the 21st century.

title: Saltwater Verses
author: Niko Swan
description: A lyrical journey of grief and healing through ocean imagery and stormy metaphors.

title: Breathe. Reset. Begin.
author: Tina Voss
description: Simple techniques to help anxious minds find calm, purpose, and a fresh start.

title: Neon Alley
author: Kazuki Shin
description: In a neon-soaked city, a graffiti artist rebels against a mind-controlling media empire.

title: The Egg and the Echo
author: Soren Veld
description: A meditation on selfhood, reincarnation, and what it means to be a single consciousness in many lives.

title: Whispers from Within
author: Anjali Devi
description: A reflective guide to tuning into your intuition and finding peace in everyday chaos.

title: The Maple Street Murders
author: Diane Harker
description: An investigative look into the unsolved killings that haunted a quiet Canadian town for a decade.

title: Pizza, Please!
author: Jess B. Crusty
description: A hilarious tale of a pizza delivery driver who accidentally gets mistaken for a secret agent.

author: Jess B.
description: A hilarious tale of a pizza delivery driver who accidentally gets mistaken for a secret agent.
